Question.Subject: Why won't aim sms messaging work for me anymore?
Question.Content: I've been using it for pretty much as long as i've been using aim to contact people that have aim. However, today I tried to message someone to their cell phone and it just doesnt work! What happened? Can someone help me out? What can I do to fix it? It says they're offline. Also they can send me messages and I cant message them back. I can message my AIM contacts perfectly fine.
Question.ChosenAnswer: I'm getting message when I start Messenger that tells me they are updating their system. Doesn't say for how long?...that's why....

Answer.Content: I'm getting message when I start Messenger that tells me they are updating their system. Doesn't say for how long?...that's why....
